original_text: “‘If you bring a grain offering baked in an oven, it is to consist of the finest flour: either thick loaves made without yeast and with olive oil mixed in or thin loaves made without yeast and brushed with olive oil.
korean_text: 네가 화덕에 구운 것으로 소제의 예물을 드리려거든 고운 가루에 기름을 섞어 만든 무교병이나 기름을 바른 무교전병을 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: If you bring a grain offering baked in an oven
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 오븐에서 구운 곡식 제물을 가져온다면

sentences.original_text: it is to consist of the finest flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 가장 고운 밀가루로 이루어져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: either thick loaves made without yeast
and with olive oil mixed in
or thin loaves made without yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 누룩 없이 만들어진 얇은 빵이거나
